attributes.additional_details:
Mis fueling at the pumps is more common then people realise. People accidently put petrol into a diesel vehicle or the other way round.
 Having a vehicle cleaned because of misfueling can be very costly. I suggest a helpful solution to this is not to have petrol pumps and diesel pumps side by side. That way a driver cannot accidently pick up the wrong fuel hose. But garages need to do more to prevent these accidents happening. Needs goverment action to implement.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the fuel retailers, and it is not clear from the petition why Government action is needed.
